summary: FOR THE PAST FEW YEARS MY WIFE'S CADILLAC SRX HEADLIGHTS HAVE BEEN GETTING WORSE AND WORSE.  WE HAVE HAD ALL BULBS REPLACED BY BILL CRAMER CHEVROLET IN PANAMA CITY FLORIDA.  THE NEW BULBS WERE BETTER FOR A LITTLE WHILE BUT NOW WHEN USING THE DIM HEADLIGHTS, YOU CANNOT EVEN TELL THEY ARE ON.  THE BRIGHT HEADLIGHTS HAVE TO BE USED AT ALL TIMES WHILE DRIVING AT NIGHT, OR YOU CANNOT SEE ANYTHING AT ALL.  THIS IS A LAWSUIT AND ACCIDENT WAITING TO HAPPEN.  I CAN DEFINITELY SEE MOISTURE GETTING INTO THE LIGHT HOUSING AND I THINK IT IS CAUSING ALL THE PROBLEMS.
